title: Project Roadmap Visualizer
goal: Translate a project plan into a visual timeline.
prompt: You are a project designer. Convert the project plan into a visual roadmap: • List milestones • Deliverables • Dependencies • Provide captions for each milestone.

responses.gpt-5:
Got it! I can create a visual roadmap outline from a project plan. To make it accurate, I need the project plan details — for example, tasks, timeline, and key objectives.

Meanwhile, here’s a generic template of a project roadmap with milestones, deliverables, dependencies, and captions. You can later plug in your project-specific items:

---

### Project Roadmap Visual Outline

#### Milestone 1: Project Initiation
* Deliverables: Project charter, initial requirements document, stakeholder list
* Dependencies: None (starting point)
* Caption: “Laying the foundation: defining scope, objectives, and stakeholders.”

#### Milestone 2: Planning & Design
* Deliverables: Detailed project plan, risk assessment, design mockups, resource allocation
* Dependencies: Completion of Project Initiation
* Caption: “Blueprints ready: designing the roadmap and assigning resources.”

#### Milestone 3: Development / Implementation Start
* Deliverables: Functional modules, initial prototypes, setup environments
* Dependencies: Approval of Planning & Design documents
* Caption: “Turning plans into action: coding, building, and initial testing.”

#### Milestone 4: Testing & QA
* Deliverables: Test cases, QA reports, bug-fix logs
* Dependencies: Completion of Development/Implementation
* Caption: “Ensuring quality: validating functionality and performance.”

#### Milestone 5: Deployment
* Deliverables: Final product release, deployment guide, user manuals
* Dependencies: Successful Testing & QA completion
* Caption: “Launch time: delivering the solution to end-users.”

#### Milestone 6: Review & Closure
* Deliverables: Project closure report, lessons learned, post-deployment support plan
* Dependencies: Deployment complete
* Caption: “Reflect and wrap up: evaluating success and documenting insights.”

---

I can also convert this into a visual Gantt-style roadmap or timeline diagram with arrows showing dependencies, color-coded milestones, and captions beneath each stage. Do you want me to create a visual diagram next?
responses.gemini-2.5:
To create a meaningful visual roadmap, I need the details of your project plan first. Please provide:
1. Project Name/Goal
2. Tasks/Phases
3. Estimated Start/End Dates for key phases/tasks (if available)

Once I have these, I will organize them into milestones, deliverables, dependencies, and captions for a visual roadmap.

---

Example output structure:
| Milestone (#) | Caption | Key Deliverables | Dependencies |
| :---: | :---: | :--- | :--- |
| M1 | Project Kick-Off & Requirements Finalized | Signed Scope Document, Technical Requirements Document (TRD) | None (Start) |
| M2 | Core System Architecture Approved | Architecture Diagram, Tech Stack Selection | M1 |
| M3 | Beta Testing Complete | Tested Codebase, Bug Report Log, Final User Feedback | M2, Development Phase Complete |

Please provide your project details to proceed.
responses.claude-3:
I'd be happy to help you create a visual roadmap! To convert it into a visual roadmap with milestones, deliverables, and dependencies, please provide:
1. Your project plan details — including phases, timeline, key milestones, and deliverables
2. Project scope — what you are building/delivering
3. Dependencies — which tasks depend on others
4. Timeline — start date, duration, target completion

Once shared, I can design a professional visual roadmap showing all milestones with captions, deliverables, dependencies, and sequence.
